r.d: Zip is an extension to create, modify and read zip files.
r.n: - add ZipArchive::EM_TRAD_PKWARE and ZipArchive::EM_UNKNOWN constants - Fix #79424 don't use gl_pathc after call to globfree (Max Rees) - add ZipArchive::isCompressionMethodSupported() method (libzip 1.7.0) - add ZipArchive::isEncryptionMethodSupported() method (libzip 1.7.0) - initial PHP 8 support
